噵字的基本解释

噵
dào
古同“道”，说，解释。

噵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dào］
［《廣韻》徒晧切，上晧，定。］
亦作“噵1”。亦作“衜1”。“衟1”的今字。
(1)道路。
(2)水流通行的途径。
(3)泛指各种通路。
(4)行程；路程。
(5)取道；经过。
(6)古代棋局上的格道。
(7)围棋局上下子的交叉点。
(8)线条。
(9)方向；方位。
(10)种类；门类。
(11)辈分；行辈。
(12)方法；途径。
(13)技艺；技术。
(14)宇宙万物的本原、本体。
(15)事理；规律。
(16)政治主张或思想体系。
(17)好的政治局面或政治措施。
(18)道德；道义。
(19)祭名。古代诸侯外出时先祭路神。
(20)指道家学派。
(21)仙术；方术。
(22)指道教或道士。
(23)指佛教或佛教徒。
(24)指某些会道门组织。
(25)遵行；实行。
(26)正直。
(27)说；讲述。
(28)知道；觉得。
(29)料想；以为。
(30)是。
(31)倒

噵字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　噵； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页211第11
【集韻】杜皓切，音稻。通作道。或作?。

噵字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
噵字的起名意思

暂无。

Puff
Basic explanation of words
Puff
dào
Gu Tong "dao", said and explained.
Puff
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dào］
["Guangyun" cut only, go up, set. ]
Also known as "噵1". Also known as "衜1". The present character of "衟1".
(1) Road.
(2) The way of water circulation.
(3) Refers to various pathways in general.
(4) Itinerary; distance.
(5) Take the road; pass.
(6) The grid in the ancient chess game.
(7) The intersection of the upper and lower pieces of the Go game.
(8) Lines.
(9) Direction; bearing.
(10) Type; category.
(11) Seniority; seniority.
(12) Method; approach.
(13) Skill; technology.
(14) The origin and noumenon of everything in the universe.
(15) Affair; law.
(16) Political opinions or ideological systems.
(17) Good political situation or political measures.
(18) Morality; morality.
(19) The name of the sacrifice. When the ancient princes went out, they sacrificed to the God of Road.
(20) Refers to the Taoist school.
(21) Xianshu; Alchemy.
(22) Refers to Taoism or Taoist priests.
(23) Refers to Buddhism or Buddhists.
(24) Refers to certain Huidaomen organizations.
(25) Compliance; implementation.
(26) Integrity.
(27) Say; tell.
(28) Know; feel.
(29) expected; thought.
(30) Yes.
(31) Invert
Puff

[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　噵; Kangxi strokes: 16; Page number: page 211-11
[Jiyun] Du Haoqie, sound rice. Pass through. Or for?.
